entry.title: The Acacia Strain - "Seeing God" (Live in Worcester, MA)

media:group.media:title: The Acacia Strain - "Seeing God" (Live in Worcester, MA)
media:group.media:description:
Listen to the full album: https://theacaciastrain.lnk.to/slow-decay
"Seeing God" (Live in Worcester, MA) by The Acacia Strain from the album 'Slow Decay,' available now
Order at: https://merchconnectioninc.com/collections/the-acacia-strain
Production Company: www.thevagrantkey.com Audio: Chris Wiest Mixing: Griffin Landa Video Editing: Griffin Landa
Lyrics
Children of the cloven hoof Bathe the cross in your father's blood Unholy priestess deliver us Glory from a poisoned mouth Formed underneath the earth Prisoner of purified dirt It grows, It grows Try to hide your terror, but it shows The blood solidifies The plants and animals die This ground is cursed Spreading for miles under the earth No shelter from the fury The end of all things Inevitable Inevitable (Seeing god) No shelter from the fury The end of all things Inevitable Indomitable We didn't sell our souls we gave them up for free We fear the dark But it's the light That exposes the true horrors of this world Catch your breath Clutch your chest Catch your breath Drop fucking dead Drop fucking dead Gazing into nothing we finally may see the truth No shelter from the fury The end of all things Inevitable Indomitable Where do your loyalties lie? This version of the world exists out of spite Where do your loyalties lie? I sit and smile that's what your worth, you die
Official Site: https://bastardcrew.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/theacaciastrain Twitter: https://twitter.com/theacaciastrain Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/theacaciastrain Merchandise: https://merchconnectioninc.com/collections/the-acacia-strain
